translation.en: ♪ Ride on the Magic School Bus ♪
I knew I should have stayed home todayyyyyy!
translation.it: Sapevo che dovevo rimanere a casa!

translation.en: Booster shutdown and separation in three... two, one...
translation.it: Arresto booster e separazione in tre... due... uno!

translation.en: We'll have you in micro-gravity in a micro-second, Ralphie.
translation.it: Sarai in microgravità in un microsecondo.

translation.en: Which has got to stand for, "It's so spectacular!"
I just have to line up the things...
translation.it: Devo solo allineare le cose e...

translation.en: Oops. A little to the left. A little to the... Ohh! Ohh!
translation.it: Devo solo allineare le cose e... Più a sinistra, a destr...

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] OK, OK, nope. Steady as she goes.
[Arnold] And I'm totally comfortable with our speed now.
translation.it: Non mi lamenterò più della nostra lentezza.

translation.en: Well, Ralphie, because you're in micro-gravity,
you're not so much flying as you are falling. Continuously.
translation.it: quindi non stai volando, stai cadendo.

translation.en: You're floating because you're in continuous freefall around the Earth.
translation.it: Siamo in caduta libera intorno alla Terra.

translation.en: OK, but... it's still a superpower.
translation.it: Va bene, ma è comunque un superpotere.

translation.en: [straining] Wait for me! Why can't I move?
translation.it: Aspettatemi! Perché non riesco a muovermi?

translation.en: Just push off of something and you'll go in the opposite direction.
translation.it: Datti una spinta. Andrai nella direzione opposta.

translation.en: Or just grab onto the Carlos Express.
As soon as I figure out how to release all the extra seat belts I added.
translation.it: Appena sgancio le cinture di sicurezza extra.

translation.en: -[kid scoffs] -What? We're 400 kilometers above the Earth.
translation.it: Che c'è? Siamo a 400 km dalla Terra.

translation.en: Hey, guys! Good to see all of you. How are ya?
translation.it: Il piacere è tutto mio. Come state?
Un attimo... lei è già stata qui?

translation.en: I did a four-month tour of duty up here right after my last stint with the circus.
translation.it: Ci ho passato quattro mesi dopo il mio periodo con il circo.

translation.en: Who knew the flying trapeze would prepare me for space?
translation.it: Prima il trapezio, e ora, lo spazio.

translation.en: And these must be the rookie astronauts we've heard so much about.
translation.it: Loro sono i famosi astronauti reclute?

translation.en: No, these are a different set of children.
These are the very first kids to board the International Space Station.
translation.it: Sì, sono i primi bambini a bordo della SSI!

translation.en: Commander Hadfield told us you guys did a great job at NASA space training.
translation.it: Vi siete distinti durante il programma NASA.

translation.en: We all trained super hard for this mission.
We are so ready for anything!
But maybe not quite ready to live in micro-g.
translation.it: Forse non così pronti per la micro-g.

translation.en: Just take it slowly. You'll get the hang of it.
Your class has the station until the next crew arrives tomorrow morning.
translation.it: Fino a domattina la stazione è tutta vostra.

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah. You can be even lazier than usual.
translation.it: Qui puoi essere pigro quanto vuoi.

translation.en: [laughs] I know, right? I don't even have to hold up my head.
translation.it: Esatto! Non devo neanche reggere la testa!

translation.en: We don't wanna be moving around in our flight suits.
[gasps] Oh! I almost forgot. Bus drone incoming!
What have you got there, Jyoti?
Whatever Itty-B sees, we see on my FrizzPad.
translation.it: Per vedere cosa vede Mini-B sul mio tablet.

translation.en: Is that the Bus remote, Ms. Frizzle?
As you know, it's also the Porta-Shrinker...
I just had this little feature installed. It's called the Shriek-a-Maker.
translation.it: E ho installato un'altra funzione. Il Generatore di urla.

translation.en: I think maybe one Shriek-a-Maker is enough.
translation.it: Credo che uno basti e avanzi.

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] If you say so. Keep this in a safe place, then.
translation.it: Se lo dici tu. Mettilo in un posto sicuro.

translation.en: Before we get to work, I have something very special to show you.
translation.it: Devo mostrarvi una cosa molto speciale.

translation.en: This is my most favorite, favorite, favorite place in the Space Station.
translation.it: Questo è il mio angolo preferito nella stazione.

translation.en: [Wanda] It makes me feel very small.
OK, astronauts, you all have your assigned positions.
translation.it: Astronauti. Vi ho assegnato i vostri posti.

translation.en: Actually, days are only 90 minutes long on the station.
translation.it: I giorni durano 90 minuti sulla stazione

translation.en: The ISS orbits Earth 16 times every 24 hours.
translation.it: La SSI gira intorno alla Terra 16 volte al giorno

translation.en: Which means we'll see the sun rise and set 16 times today.
translation.it: quindi oggi il sole sorgerà e tramonterà 16 volte.

translation.en: The janitor. I'm psyched! 'Cause I get to do stuff like this.
translation.it: Il custode. Sono felice perché posso fare cose così.

translation.en: Since there aren't any washing machines on the ISS,
dirty laundry goes into a capsule that we drop into Earth's atmosphere, where it burns it up as it falls.
translation.it: quindi lanciamo il bucato in una capsula che prende fuoco nell'atmosfera.

translation.en: Is that... a monogrammed hand towel?
translation.it: È un asciugamano con le tue iniziali?

translation.en: Yup. Never leave Earth without one.
translation.it: Me ne porto sempre uno dalla Terra.

translation.en: Now to make this place smell lemon pine springtime mountain air fresh.
translation.it: Ora profumerò questo posto di fiori e fresco...

translation.en: You know what, fun fact: they don't allow aerosol cans in space because...
translation.it: Gli spray non sono permessi nello spazio perché causano

translation.en: In the station's micro-g, we can only really move around
translation.it: Nella micro-g della stazione ci si muove spingendosi contro qualcosa

translation.en: when we push ourselves off a surface
translation.it: ci si muove spingendosi contro qualcosa

translation.en: or when a force pushes against us,
translation.it: o quando una forza ci spinge

translation.en: like compressed air shooting out of an aerosol can.
translation.it: come l'aria compressa di uno spray.

translation.en: For every action, there's an equal and opposite reaction.
translation.it: Per ogni azione c'è una reazione uguale e inversa.
E me lo dice solo ora?

translation.en: -Can I do it again? -We're in space, Ralphie.
translation.it: Posso rifarlo? Questa non è un'esercitazione.

translation.en: This isn't a drill. You need to be serious.
translation.it: Questa non è un'esercitazione. Sii più serio.
Ma dai! La prendo sul serio.

translation.en: When am I ever not serious?
translation.it: Quando mai non sono stato serio?

translation.en: Um, all those times during space training?

translation.it: Ralphie, ci sei o ci fai?

translation.en: I'm having a lot of fun at Space Training...
translation.it: Il training spaziale è uno spasso.

translation.en: Aaah! Direct hit, but no effect.
The alien shields are too strong.
Our photon cannons are useless against a ship of this size.
translation.it: La nave è troppo grande per i nostri cannoni fotonici.
Ralphie, ci sei o ci fai?

translation.en: OK, but now that we're actually in space, I will be super serious. Trust me.
translation.it: E va bene... ma ora che siamo nello spazio, sarò serissimo. Fidatevi.

translation.en: Good. And the first step in being serious is communication.
translation.it: Bene. E il primo passo è la comunicazione.

translation.en: It's important to let everyone know what you're doing at all times.
translation.it: Devi comunicarci tutto quello che fai, sempre.

translation.en: I'm scratching my armpit now because it's super itchy.
translation.it: Ora mi sto grattando l'ascella perché mi prude.

translation.en: So there's no such thing as over-communicating in space?
translation.it: Quindi nello spazio ci si dice tutto?

translation.en: Even the labels here are written in both English and Russian
translation.it: Le etichette sono in inglese e in russo

translation.en: for the crews that speak those languages.
translation.it: per i membri che le parlano.

translation.en: English-speaking astronauts learn a little Russian and Russian cosmonauts learn a little English.
translation.it: Gli astronauti anglofoni imparano il russo e i russi imparano l'inglese.

translation.en: That's right, and they end up speaking a mixture of the two called "Runglish."
All right, class, to your stations.
[Like Darth Vader] Wanda, this is your destiny...
translation.it: Wanda, questo è il corso di studi

translation.en: It's the US laboratory where many science experiments
translation.it: Il laboratorio USA, dove vengono condotti tanti esperimenti.

translation.en: are being run at any given time.
Sometimes the best way to understand how things work
translation.it: A volte per capire il funzionamento delle cose,

translation.en: is to look at them in a brand-new way.
Have a look at this, Science Officer Wanda. It's a tardigrade.
translation.it: Ufficiale scientifico, questo è un tardigrado.

translation.en: [Wanda] Ooh. I've read about tardigrades, but I've never seen one for real.
translation.it: Li conoscevo solo attraverso i libri, finora.

translation.en: They're the only known animals that can survive in the irradiated vacuum of space, right?
translation.it: Sono gli unici animali a sopravvivere nello spazio, vero?

translation.en: Which is why scientists are interested in studying them in this environment.
translation.it: Per questo gli scienziati li studiano nel loro ambiente.

translation.en: It's two hairs past "I need to adjust the solar panels or we'll lose power and freeze in space" o'clock.
translation.it: Se non riparo i pannelli solari, congeleremo nello spazio.

translation.en: What are you looking at, Wanda?
[Ralphie] Blecch. It looks like something I need to clean up.
It's a tardigrade, and it's cute.
translation.it: È un tardigrado ed è carino.

translation.en: Just look at those chubby legs.
Who's a cute little water animal?
I'm going to call you... Pinky.
Hey, who wants in on this genuine Space Ice Cream I brought?
Me-me-me-me! Blasting dirty laundry into space is hungry work.
translation.it: Io! Bruciare biancheria nello spazio mette fame.

translation.en: You do know Space Ice Cream
translation.it: Sai che non dovremmo mangiarlo nello spazio,

translation.en: isn't actually supposed to be eaten in space, right?
translation.it: Sai che non dovremmo mangiarlo nello spazio, vero?

translation.en: Why would they call it "Space Ice Cream" if you can't eat it in space?
translation.it: E perché lo chiamano gelato spaziale, allora?

translation.en: Good, 'cause if those crumbs get into the ISS's delicate electronics,
translation.it: Bene, perché se si infilassero nei circuiti elettronici,

translation.en: Is this you taking things seriously?
[mouth full] But this stuff is seriously good.
translation.it: Ma questo gelato è buono sul serio.

translation.en: [groans] I'll find the portable vacuum cleaner. [Wanda] I'll help you look.
No, I'm the Chief Maintenance Officer. I'll clean up this mess.
translation.it: No. Sono il Capo della manutenzione. Pulisco io.

translation.en: Hey, Arn, that's the Porta-Shrinker, isn't it?
If I biggify these crumbs, they'll be easier to catch.
I can see the logic. But be safe, OK?
translation.it: La cosa ha senso, ma fa' attenzione, va bene?

translation.en: Cool! Now the crumbs are the size of baseballs.
It's a high fly ball! And Carlos catches it.
translation.it: È una palla alta e Carlos la prende.

translation.en: Over to you, Chief Maintenance Officer.
translation.it: Tocca a te, Capo della manutenzione.

translation.en: C'mon, everyone. Time to get back to work.
translation.it: Dai, ragazzi. Abbiamo una stazione spaziale da mandare avanti.

translation.en: We have a space station to run.
translation.it: Abbiamo una stazione spaziale da mandare avanti.

translation.en: Another fine job by the Chief Maintenance Officer.
Phew. That really made me work up a sweat. Whoo!
translation.it: Mi ha fatto sudare sette camicie.

translation.en: This towel is really filling up.

translation.it: Che c'è? Non è la fine del mondo.

translation.en: What in the name of all that's black hole-y is that?
translation.it: Che acciderbolina è quel buco nero?

translation.en: You know, when I first came up here,
I tried to wash my hair using regular shampoo,
translation.it: mi lavai capelli con uno shampoo normale,

translation.en: but when you try to rinse it out, the water goes everywhere.
translation.it: ma quando lo risciacqui, l'acqua va ovunque.

translation.en: So now I use this special rinseless shampoo.
translation.it: Quindi ora uso uno shampoo senza risciacquo.

translation.en: ♪ Just rub it in your hair And leave it there ♪
translation.it: Basta applicarlo sui capelli e via.

translation.en: It's "the CO2 levels need to be adjusted or we'll be in serious trouble" o'clock.
translation.it: Se non regoliamo il livello di CO2, saremo in guai seri.

translation.en: [laughs] Never a dull moment on the ISS.
translation.it: Non ci si annoia mai qui.

translation.en: I love how you don't need any chairs in space.
translation.it: Nello spazio le sedie non servono, forte!

translation.en: Who wants some macaroni and cheese, hot from the oven?
translation.it: Chi vuole i maccheroni al formaggio?

translation.en: Ralphie, what did I say about communication?

translation.it: Spaziale! In giro per la stazione!

translation.en: OK, that's better communication. But as Commander, it's my job to...
translation.it: Ora il messaggio è più chiaro. Come comandante, chiamerò...
la sala di controllo. Voi... Scappiamo!

translation.en: -Great idea, Safety Officer. -Just doing my job.

translation.it: Siamo sotto attacco! Che si fa?

translation.en: I've seen way too many scary movies to hide in a bathroom.
Hang on, I'm getting a brilliant Chief Maintenance Officer idea.
translation.it: Mi è venuta un'intuizione da Capo manutenzione.

translation.en: Both toilets on the ISS work with a fan suction system
translation.it: I due bagni hanno un sistema aspirante

translation.en: to suck the pee and pookadumpadoody away.
translation.it: per la pipì e per la pupù.

translation.en: Can we talk plumbing when we're not being hunted by a monster?
translation.it: Ti sembra il momento di parlarne?

translation.en: This tube is for number one and this seat is where you do number two.
translation.it: Questo è per la pipì. E questo è per la pupù.

translation.en: I see where you're going. We could--
Suck the monster out into space--
The monster's way too big to fit down there.
translation.it: È troppo grosso per il tubo.

translation.en: Don't worry. I'm sure you're "flushed" with other ideas.
translation.it: Ma sono certo che ti verrà un'altra idea.

translation.en: Now I have to go to the bathroom.
Nothing like the clean, crisp taste of water distilled from astronaut urine.
translation.it: Niente rinfresca come l'acqua distillata dalle urine di astronauta.

translation.en: It's been filtered and cleaned by the water reclamation system and turned back into pure drinking water.
translation.it: È filtrata dall'impianto di recupero e trasformata in acqua potabile.

translation.en: Ewww! I don't know what's scarier, the monster or that fact.
translation.it: Bleaw! Fa quasi più schifo del mostro.

translation.en: Oh! You guys, don't be so judge-y.
Water treatment plants on Earth do sort of the same thing.
translation.it: Anche sulla Terra filtriamo l'acqua così.
È ora di fare il bis.

translation.en: [Ralphie] Why me, why me, why me?
I can't, I can't, I can't.
Living creatures need it, no matter how small or big they may be.
translation.it: Tutte le creature, grandi e piccole, ne hanno bisogno.

translation.en: Told ya you should never leave Earth without it.
You guys, I think our "monster" is Pinky.
translation.it: Ragazzi, credo che il mostro sia Mignolo.

translation.en: I'd know those cute, chubby legs anywhere.
How did it get so big?
As In-flight Entertainment Officer, I turned on the cameras to record our time here.
translation.it: Come addetto all'intrattenimento, ho acceso le telecamere.

translation.en: I can rewind the footage to see what happened.
Keep it together, Keesha. Don't think about the giant monster.
translation.it: Calmati, Kiera. Non pensare al mostro gigante. Respira.
Non pensare al mostro gigante. Respira.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Now send the SOS to Mission Control.
Is there an intercom system? There's something I need to communicate.
translation.it: C'è un interfono? Devo comunicare una cosa.

translation.en: The monster is actually a tardigrade.
Ooh, my brilliant class does it again.
translation.it: I miei brillanti allievi la sanno lunga.
Ma i tardigradi non sono microscopici?

translation.en: I... accidentally biggified it with the Porta-Shrinker.
translation.it: L'ho ingigantito per sbaglio col Rimpicciolitore.

translation.en: So here's what I'm going to do: I'm going to find the Porta-Shrinker
translation.it: Ho un piano. Ridurrò il tardigrado con il Rimpicciolitore.

translation.en: and zap the tardigrade small again.
translation.it: Ridurrò il tardigrado con il Rimpicciolitore.
Direi che è un buon piano.

translation.en: Meanwhile, stay away from the giant tardigrade.
translation.it: Intanto, state alla larga dal tardigrado.

translation.en: It may not be dangerous, but then again, who knows?
translation.it: Potrebbe essere innocuo, ma chi lo sa?

translation.en: -[beeping] -I'm searching for "how to deal with a giant tardigrade floating around the ISS,"
translation.it: Sto facendo delle ricerche per capire come agire.

translation.en: but for some reason I'm not finding anything.
However we can find the tardigrade with Itty-B.
We can watch through its camera.

translation.it: Distrugge il sistema di supporto vitale.

translation.en: But there's nothing to worry about, right?
Because there's like four backup systems?
these systems filter air that we can breathe and water we can drink.
translation.it: questi sistemi filtrano l'aria e l'acqua sulla SSI.

translation.en: Perplexing. It's like it's searching for something.
That may not be far from the truth. Some tardigrades are actually carnivorous.
translation.it: Non hai tutti i torti. Alcuni tardigradi sono carnivori.

translation.en: Negative. Ms. Frizzle would never let that thing eat us.
But if it does eat you, then you have the once-in-a-lifetime chance
translation.it: Ma se vi mangiasse, provereste il brivido

translation.en: to experience being eaten by a giant tardigrade. Win-win.
translation.it: di essere mangiati da un tardigrado gigante, che forza!

translation.en: You know, this is even more exciting than the band of belligerent beetles
translation.it: È ancora più forte dei coleotteri belligeranti,

translation.en: that got loose on the station when I was here.
translation.it: della mia prima volta sulla SSI.

translation.en: I'm pretty sure we got them all.
Um... guys? The tardigrade is on the move!
translation.it: Ragazzi... il tardigrado si è mosso!

translation.en: It sounds like Itty-B is trying to warn us about something.
translation.it: Mini-B sta provando a dirci qualcosa.

translation.en: Oh, you guys. Where's your sense of adventure?
[panting] At least we're getting... a workout running from this thing.
translation.it: Beh, almeno ci alleniamo mentre fuggiamo.

translation.en: It's especially important to exercise on the ISS.
According to my research, with less gravity to work against,
translation.it: Secondo la mia ricerca, la gravità ridotta indebolisce i muscoli

translation.en: our muscles lose strength and our bones lose some density in space.
translation.it: la gravità ridotta indebolisce i muscoli e le ossa perdono densità nello spazio.

translation.en: We get weaker the longer we're in space? Why does anyone come here?
translation.it: Cioè nello spazio ci indeboliamo? Perché ci siamo venuti?

translation.en: Would anyone like a towel to suck up their sweat?
translation.it: Volete un asciugamano per il sudore?

translation.en: Gotta towel your own sweat off in micro-g.
translation.it: E ci tocca asciugarci il sudore.

translation.en: So how do we get rid of this thing?
translation.it: - Come ce ne liberiamo? - Con un lazo?

translation.en: -Lasso it? -Lure it somewhere with space stew?
translation.it: - Come ce ne liberiamo? - Con un lazo? Lo attiriamo con lo stufato?

translation.en: Build a robotic power suit to wear in an epic showdown?
All great ideas, but just so you know, none of them worked on the beetles.
translation.it: Idee brillanti, ma non hanno funzionato con i coleotteri.

translation.en: There you are. I have a great idea!
Maybe we don't have to get rid of the creature.
Still waiting for the great idea.
We could keep it. As a pet.
He has a name, remember? Pinky.
Probably not a good idea to keep it as a pet,
translation.it: Non è una buona idea tenerlo con noi.

translation.en: and since I haven't found the Porta-Shrinker yet,
I know exactly what to do.
But first I need everyone on the Bus.
translation.it: Ma prima, saliamo tutti sul bus.

translation.en: You can wake me when he gets here. Time for my scheduled shut-eye.
translation.it: Svegliatemi quando arriva. È l'ora del pisolino.

translation.en: So, what's the plan? Get on the Bus and leave?
translation.it: Il piano sarebbe fuggire sul bus?

translation.en: As Chief Safety Officer, I say we discuss the pros and cons.
translation.it: Come capo della sicurezza, propongo di valutare pro e contro.

translation.en: This is my mess. So I'm going to clean it up.
translation.it: È colpa mia, e devo vedermela io.

translation.en: And I want you all to stay safe while I do it.
translation.it: E voglio che voi restiate al sicuro.

translation.en: You do know we can open the door from this side too, right?
translation.it: Sai che la porta si apre anche da qui, vero?

translation.en: [various kids] Oh, no! Ralphie! Get out of there!
The tardigrade is right behind you!
translation.it: Il tardigrado è dietro di te!

translation.en: you overgrown science experiment gone horribly wrong because of me.
translation.it: esperimento scientifico fallito a causa mia.

translation.en: -[Wanda] Ralphie! -[Carlos] Come back! It's too dangerous!
[Keesha] What are you doing, Ralphie? Communication is key, remember?
translation.it: Che fai? La comunicazione è tutto, ricordi?

translation.en: [Wanda] Yeah, and I'm going to communicate how mad I'll be if you hurt Pinky.
translation.it: Sì, e se fai male a Mignolo, te la vedrai con me!

translation.en: Gotta find the Porta-Shrinker before Pinky finds me.
translation.it: Devo trovare il Rimpicciolitore prima che Mignolo trovi me.

translation.en: This may be the worst idea I've ever had.
translation.it: Potrebbe essere l'idea peggiore della mia vita.
E ne ho avute di pessime.
Ti ho preso. Sei al sicuro.

translation.en: Wait, I'll just keep going the same direction,
translation.it: Oh no! Devo fermarmi o andrò dritto verso di lui.
Devo fermarmi o andrò dritto verso di lui.

translation.en: Must get back to the hatch...
[straining] Come on, hatch. Open, open, open!

translation.it: Alla fine, ti ho preso io.

translation.en: -Wha--? -Don't you dare hurt that poor tardigrade.
Giant tardigrades have feelings too, you know.
translation.it: Anche i tardigradi hanno dei sentimenti.

translation.en: Feelings of anger, rage and fury!
Is it gonna eat him? I can't look.
How can Ms. Frizzle sleep at a time like this?
translation.it: Come può dormire in un momento così?

translation.en: According to her schedule, it's what she's supposed to be doing right now.
translation.it: Questa è esattamente l'ora del suo pisolino.

translation.en: The ISS orbits Earth 16 times every 24 hours
translation.it: La SSI gira intorno alla Terra 16 volte al giorno,

translation.en: so astronauts don't have a big block of nighttime like on Earth.
translation.it: quindi non abbiamo molte ore notturne

translation.en: It's very important for astronauts to get their sleep.
Yeah, I get that's super important.
Except there's a giant tardigrade loose on the station!
translation.it: ma c'è un tardigrado gigante sulla SSI!

translation.en: [kids] We're stuck in the Bus! Ms. Frizzle! Wake up! Giant tardigrade!
translation.it: - Siamo in trappola! - Il tardigrado gigante!

translation.en: Looks like we'll just have to figure this one out ourselves.
translation.it: A quanto pare, dovremo cavarcela da soli.

translation.en: No Porta-Shrinker in here either, and this is the end of the station.
translation.it: Niente Rimpicciolitore. E la stazione finisce qui.

translation.en: If eating me will save everyone else...
Wanda said tardigrades are water animals, but you've been floating around for ages without any water.
translation.it: Wanda dice che sei un animale acquatico, e sei senz'acqua da ore.
Non davi la caccia a noi.

translation.en: The water reclamation pipes are behind the life-support systems.
translation.it: I tubi dell'acqua sono dietro i sistemi di supporto.

translation.en: The water pouches... even the sweat on our faces.
translation.it: Le sacche d'acqua e il nostro sudore...

translation.en: It was all irresistible to you, wasn't it, big guy?
I'll take that as a yes.
You're making me all thirsty now.
A big guy like you needs more than this.
Good thing water just drifts in globules in micro-g.
translation.it: Fortuna che l'acqua si raccoglie in gocce nella micro-g.

translation.en: Let's shove some of these together and...
You know, you're not as gross as I thought you were.

translation.it: Un attimo. Quello è il Rimpicciolitore portatile?

translation.en: Why in the world did you swallow the Porta-Shrinker?
Yeccch! I don't have the handbook memorized,
but I think this is well beyond normal Chief Maintenance Officer duties.
translation.it: ma questo non rientra nelle flatulenze del Capo manutenzione.

translation.en: Now, should I tell everyone what just happened
translation.it: Dovrei dire a tutti cosa è successo?

translation.en: or clean up this mess first and then go tell them?
translation.it: O è meglio ripulire tutto, prima?

translation.en: We get to launch more laundry.
I'm coming for you, sweet Pinky!
Good thing tardigrades can survive in the vacuum of space.
translation.it: Fortuna che i tardigradi sopravvivono nello spazio.

translation.en: You weren't cleared for a space walk. Get back here.
translation.it: Non puoi vagare per lo spazio. Vieni!

translation.en: I mean I found the Porta-Shrinker. Pinky's small again. Microscopic. Trust me.
translation.it: Ho rimpicciolito Mignolo con il Rimpicciolitore.

translation.en: Pinky's OK? Then I guess everything's tied up.
translation.it: Sta bene? Siamo tutti al sicuro, allora.

translation.en: -You OK? -What's going on with the tardigrade?
No time to explain! Wanda's outside the station.
translation.it: Non c'è tempo! Wanda è nello spazio!

translation.en: She's not tethered. She's floating away!
If only we had something long enough to reach her.
The giant robotic arm attached to the outside of the station: Canadarm2.
translation.it: Con il braccio robotico della stazione. Canadarm2.

translation.en: Great thinking, Robotic Specialist. You're up.
translation.it: Bravo, Specialista robotico. Forza. Riporta Wanda a casa!

translation.en: OK. Remember your training. Remember your training...
I can do this. I can do this!
I'm going to save Wanda, Chief Maintenance Officer style.
translation.it: Come Capo della manutenzione, salverò Wanda.

translation.en: Let me guess: you thought the tardigrade wanted to eat you,
translation.it: Vediamo... Pensavate che il tardigrado vi mangiasse, invece voleva solo bere.

translation.en: but it was looking for water. It's a water animal, after all.
translation.it: Pensavate che il tardigrado vi mangiasse, invece voleva solo bere.

translation.en: Ralphie found the Porta-Shrinker when the tardigrade excreted it, though I have no idea how it ended up swallowing it,
translation.it: Ralphie ha trovato il Rimpicciolitore nelle feci del tardigrado.

translation.en: and Ralphie managed to shrink it back to its regular size.
Then he cleaned up the poo and ejected the laundry capsule with its dirty clothes
translation.it: ha pulito la cacca ed espulso il bucato

translation.en: but Wanda thought he'd ejected the tardigrade and went to save it,
translation.it: ma Wanda pensava fosse il tardigrado

translation.en: neglecting to tether herself properly, so Tim used the Canadarm2 to catch her,
translation.it: ed è andata a riprenderlo senza agganci.

translation.en: and he did, but Wanda's tether slipped and now she's too far away to grab. And that's why Ralphie is trying to save Wanda.
translation.it: Tim non è riuscito a riagganciarla e ora ci sta provando Ralphie.

translation.en: Did I get it? Was I close?
And look at Ralphie go. Hello, Ralphie.
I see you've learned a thing or two about moving around in micro-g.
translation.it: Vedo che ora te la cavi meglio nella micro-g.

translation.en: Yeah, I know I can't move without pushing against something,
translation.it: Sì, mi sono spinto contro la superficie della stazione

translation.en: so I pushed off the station to head towards Wanda.
translation.it: Sì, mi sono spinto contro la superficie della stazione per andare da Wanda.

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] Of course. It's the only way to reach Wanda.
translation.it: È l'unico modo per agganciare Wanda.

translation.en: Now to make this rescue smell lemon pine springtime mountain air fresh!
translation.it: E ora, diamo una ventata di fiori e fresco a questo salvataggio.

translation.en: If I had just told everyone what I was doing first...
I know, I know, "communication is key."
translation.it: Lo so. La comunicazione è tutto.

translation.en: I'll make it up to you as soon as we're back on the station.
Just don't do it with Space Ice Cream, OK?
translation.it: Ma non con un gelato spaziale, d'accordo?

translation.en: -[Wanda] Uh-oh! -[Ralphie] Ah, well. No problem. I'll just...
translation.it: Bene, ora non mi resta che...

translation.en: [Tim] Oh no, they're too far out!
[Ralphie] And there's nothing left for us to push off of.
translation.it: Non c'è più nulla contro cui spingerci.

translation.en: For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction.
translation.it: Ad ogni azione corrisponde una reazione uguale e inversa.

translation.en: Ralphie, there is one thing left for us to push off of...
I'm sorry, Ralphie, but there was no other way.
translation.it: Perdonami, ma non c'era altro modo.

translation.en: What do we do? We need a plan B!
translation.it: Che facciamo? Ci serve un piano B.

translation.en: In a very short time, you've learned how to live and move in space.
translation.it: Avete imparato a muovervi nello spazio,

translation.en: [Ralphie] Repairing the damage to the Space Station.
We have some serious work to do.
translation.it: Abbiamo un bel po' da fare.

translation.en: Well said, Chief Maintenance Officer Ralphie.
All of the life-support systems and their backups are online.
translation.it: I sistemi di supporto vitale e i backup sono online.

translation.en: And I replenished some of our water supply. You're welcome.
translation.it: Ho rifornito la riserva d'acqua. Non c'è di che!

translation.en: Here's a little for you too, big guy.
Another Soyuz spacecraft is here with our replacement crew.
translation.it: I colleghi ci hanno portato una nuova navetta.

translation.en: Great to see you again, kids.
So, how was your time on the ISS? Anything unusual happen?
translation.it: Com'è andata? Si sono verificati eventi insoliti?

translation.en: I can't say I'm sad to be going home.
translation.it: È un sollievo tornare a casa.

translation.en: I am. I was just getting good at moving around in micro-g.
translation.it: Non per me. Mi stavo abituando alla micro-g.

translation.en: I don't know about anyone else, but when I get back,
translation.it: Non so voi, ma appena torno a casa,

translation.en: I'm going to sleep for 12 hours straight.
[snorts] Of course you can... share my sandwich, Pinky.
translation.it: Certo che puoi dare un morso al mio panino, Mignolo.

translation.en: He got so good at communicating, he's even doing it in his sleep.
translation.it: È così bravo a comunicare che lo fa pure nel sonno.

translation.en: Hello. Commander Hadfield here. How can I help?
When the kids arrived at the ISS, they seemed pretty good at getting around in micro-gravity.
translation.it: I ragazzi si sono destreggiati bene nella microgravità.

translation.en: Well, many astronauts need a few days to get used to life in micro-g when arriving at the ISS.
translation.it: Spesso ai nuovi astronauti sulla SSI occorre qualche giorno.

translation.en: Some even feel "space sick," which is a lot like feeling sea sick.
translation.it: Ad alcuni viene il mal di spazio, proprio come nel mare.

translation.en: It takes practice and some particular techniques.
The astronauts use hand holds to move ourselves around.
And when astronauts need to stand still,
they use foot straps to hold their feet in place.
[kid] If things go wrong on the ISS, like electrical systems being destroyed
translation.it: Se, ad esempio, un tardigrado distruggesse i sistemi elettrici

translation.en: by a humongous tardigrade, wouldn't NASA or someone notice?
translation.it: un tardigrado distruggesse i sistemi elettrici la NASA lo saprebbe?

translation.en: Absolutely. The ISS is in constant contact with space agencies around the Earth.
translation.it: Certo. La SSI è in collegamento con tutte le agenzie spaziali.

translation.en: Every little detail aboard the ISS,
from the functioning of the life support systems to what the astronauts eat, is closely monitored.
translation.it: dal sistema di supporto vitale ai pasti degli astronauti.

translation.en: If you tried to sneak Space Ice Cream aboard...
But even if the engineers on Earth know what's going on in the ISS,
translation.it: Ma anche se gli ingegneri sanno tutto,

translation.en: it's still up to us to do repairs and maintenance
translation.it: spetta a noi eseguire le riparazioni

translation.en: and keep the ISS in working order.
[kid] Ms. Frizzle was exercising to prevent muscle and bone density loss while visiting the ISS.
translation.it: Miss Frizzle si allena per prevenire la perdita di massa ossea

translation.en: Without gravity pulling us downwards in space, our bodies do a lot less work supporting themselves.
translation.it: La gravità trascina verso il basso, ma in sua assenza, il corpo lavora meno

translation.en: And when you don't use your muscles, you lose them.
So, astronauts need to stay on top of their workout regimens,

translation.it: su macchine studiate per mantenere muscoli e ossa

translation.en: to keep their muscles and their bones in their pre-flight condition.
translation.it: su macchine studiate per mantenere muscoli e ossa in condizioni ottimali.

translation.en: I'd better start training if I'm going to be an astronaut one day.
translation.it: Devo allenarmi se voglio diventare astronauta.

translation.en: [Arnold] Please let this be a normal field trip!
translation.it: Fa' che sia una semplice gita.
- Con la Friz? - Non ci credo!

translation.en: ♪ Oh, cruising on down Main Street ♪
♪ Next thing that you know ♪ -♪ You're seeing... ♪ -[Ms. Frizzle] Whoo-hooo!
♪ Take a left at your intestine ♪
♪ Take your second right past Mars ♪
♪ Climb on the Magic School Bus ♪
-♪ Spank a plankton, too ♪ -[Wanda] Take that!

translation.it: Navighi su un fiume di lava

translation.en: ♪ Such a fine thing to do ♪
♪ So strap your bones right to the seat ♪
♪ Come on in and don't be shy ♪
♪ Just to make your day complete ♪
♪ You might get baked into a pie ♪
♪ Step in, step in, step inside ♪
♪ It's a wilder ride, come on! ♪
♪ Ride on the Magic School Bus! ♪
